title: Patient-Reported Outcome Measures in Individuals With Hereditary or Sporadic Kidney Cancer

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 67% patient compliance rate in studies using digital platforms enhances data reliability.
**TACTICAL WIN [ROADMAP]**: Integrate AI-driven insights to personalize patient engagement strategies for ePROs.
